webforest 0.2.1

  • Changelog

Column helper: Image display

Source: R/classes-components.R
col_img.Rd

Display inline images from URLs.

col_img(
  field,
  header = NULL,
  width = NULL,
  height = NULL,
  max_width = NULL,
  fallback = "ðŸ“·",
  shape = c("square", "circle", "rounded"),
  ...
)

Arguments

field

Field name containing image URLs

header

Column header (default NULL, uses field name)

width

Column width in pixels (NULL for auto-sizing based on content)

height

Image height in pixels (default NULL, uses row height - 4)

max_width

Maximum image width (default NULL, uses column width)

fallback

Fallback text or icon if image fails to load (default "ðŸ“·")

shape

Image shape: "square", "circle", or "rounded" (default "square")

...

Additional arguments passed to web_col(), including cell styling: bold, italic, color, bg, emphasis, muted, accent (column names)

Value

A ColumnSpec object

Examples

# Simple image column
col_img("logo_url", "Logo")
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "logo_url"
#>  @ header        : chr "Logo"
#>  @ field         : chr "logo_url"
#>  @ type          : chr "img"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "center"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ img:List of 4
#>  ..  ..$ height  : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ maxWidth: NULL
#>  ..  ..$ fallback: chr "ðŸ“·"
#>  ..  ..$ shape   : chr "square"
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: NULL
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL

# Circular avatars
col_img("avatar_url", "Avatar", shape = "circle", width = 40)
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "avatar_url"
#>  @ header        : chr "Avatar"
#>  @ field         : chr "avatar_url"
#>  @ type          : chr "img"
#>  @ width         : num 40
#>  @ align         : chr "center"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ img:List of 4
#>  ..  ..$ height  : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ maxWidth: NULL
#>  ..  ..$ fallback: chr "ðŸ“·"
#>  ..  ..$ shape   : chr "circle"
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: NULL
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL

# With fallback
col_img("thumbnail", fallback = "No image")
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "thumbnail"
#>  @ header        : chr "thumbnail"
#>  @ field         : chr "thumbnail"
#>  @ type          : chr "img"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "center"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ img:List of 4
#>  ..  ..$ height  : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ maxWidth: NULL
#>  ..  ..$ fallback: chr "No image"
#>  ..  ..$ shape   : chr "square"
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: NULL
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL

# With per-cell styling
col_img("logo_url", emphasis = "is_featured")
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "logo_url"
#>  @ header        : chr "logo_url"
#>  @ field         : chr "logo_url"
#>  @ type          : chr "img"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "center"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ img:List of 4
#>  ..  ..$ height  : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ maxWidth: NULL
#>  ..  ..$ fallback: chr "ðŸ“·"
#>  ..  ..$ shape   : chr "square"
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: chr "is_featured"
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL
